III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
No technical assistance was needed.
V. CONSULTATION
No consultation was requested.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There was one substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
The facility has not had any corrective action plans during this licensing period. The
facility had one special investigation during this licensing period and were found in
non-compliance, the corrective action plan was approved on August 26, 2021. This
corrective action plan will be monitored throughout the next licensing period.
A tour of the facility took place on 8/24/2021. The facility is in good condition, very
cleaned and well-maintained. The facility has various pods, a cafeteria, outdoor area
that has a small garden, two gymnasiums, and several classrooms for youth to attend
school.
Staff and Youth reported feeling supported at the facility; youth with the staff that work
with them and staff with their supervisors and administration. Staff had reported some
concerns they faced throughout the pandemic however felt that administration
handled everything as best as they were able to and they had continued support
throughout the year.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
